data.name: txtLogo
data.value: Fate Explorer Logo

data.name: FateQuote1
data.value: One can only explore fate as it unfolds ...

data.name: FateQuote10
data.value: Fate rolls the dice ... and we play.

data.name: FateQuote11
data.value: Fate does not care about you.

data.name: FateQuote12
data.value: Even the smallest can change the course of fate.

data.name: FateQuote2
data.value: Fate is what happens to you while you're making other plans.

data.name: FateQuote3
data.value: It is written then...

data.name: FateQuote4
data.value: Amor fati

data.name: FateQuote5
data.value: Fate is not meant to be fair ... but entertaining.

data.name: FateQuote6
data.value: Fate loves the fearless.

data.name: FateQuote8
data.value: Fate isn't in the stars. It's somewhere on page 42.

data.name: FateQuote9
data.value: Your fate is sealed. Enjoy it.

data.name: lblSmartSheet
data.value: Smart character sheet

data.name: lblCharacterFocus
data.value: Focus on your character

data.name: txtSmartSheet
data.value: Fate Explorer is your smart character sheet with the intention to relieve you of many tasks. You can create characters with the tool Optolith and play with them with Fate Explorer.

data.name: txtTeaserQuestion
data.value: What do you need Fate Explorer for?

data.name: lblSmoothGamePlay
data.value: Smoother game play

data.name: lblStartFinding
data.value: Stop searching, start finding

data.name: txtSmoothGamePlay
data.value: Less googling or browsing through books to find what you need. Fate Explorer helps game masters and players makes information easily accessible.

data.name: lblRichGamePlay
data.value: Enrich your game play

data.name: lblNeedToKnow
data.value: What you need to know

data.name: txtRichGamePlay
data.value: Find relevant knowledge about the vast DSA world that supports your game play. With in-app information and references to the Ulisses Wiki you can get lots of details.

data.name: Cookie1
data.value: Please note that Fate Explorer uses cookies to store the state of app and characters.

data.name: Cookie2
data.value: That includes: the current date you set and the app settings. Also, when you re-load a character Fate Explorer may recognize it and load the last known health points and other values you may have changed.

data.name: Cookie3
data.value: Fate Explorer does no tracking or other stuff with these cookies. Their only purpose is your convenience.

data.name: Cookie4
data.value: At this moment it is not possible to use Fate Explorer without this feature. By continuing you accept the fact that data is stored on your computer.

data.name: Cookie5
data.value: Please apologize that I talk to you like a Horasian Comte but here at this point I am obliged to do so.
